definition: the Western Paradise (Buddhism)
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
day/sky/heaven
to enter heaven/to rise to the Western Paradise

sentences.english: A decent meal and a drink afterward were not the worst way to go.
sentences.chinese: 一顿美餐然后一瓶美酒，这不算上西天的最差待遇。

sentences.english: It made many people die and even made Nado go to hell.
sentences.chinese: 它使得很多人死去，甚至差点把那多送西天。

sentences.english: Poor John was one of those who went west in the explosion.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的约翰是在这次爆炸中魂回西天的人物之一。

sentences.english: After experiencing lots of bitterness and sorrow, they finally reached the West.
sentences.chinese: 两人历经千辛万苦，终于到达西天。

sentences.english: To gaze at western sky for an eternal line.
sentences.chinese: 望着西天边不死的一条缝。

sentences.english: Poor John were one of those who go west in the explosion.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的约翰是在这次爆炸中魂归西天的人物之一。

sentences.english: Evening after evening, …gazing off west as if in reverie.
sentences.chinese: 只见我出神似的倚在桥栏上向西天凝望。

sentences.english: We are all going to the west for Buddhist scriptures .
sentences.chinese: 我们几个是去西天取经的。

sentences.english: Their pet rabbit had gone to the great rabbit hutch in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他们的宠物兔已回到西天的兔宫了。

sentences.english: Once the task was accomplished, Goddess of Western Heaven rewarded the archer with a pill that would make him immortal.
sentences.chinese: 任务完成后，西天的上帝将给弓箭手长生药。

sentences.english: If the bomb explodes, we shall all be sent to kingdom come.
sentences.chinese: 如果炸弹爆炸，我们都得上西天。

sentences.english: Any more words before I send you into oblivion?
sentences.chinese: 就要送你上西天了，还有什么话说吗？

sentences.english: Poor John were first of these which go west in the explosion.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的约翰是在这次爆炸中魂归西天的人物之一。

definition: tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
Buddha/founder of a buddhist sect
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

definition: middle of the forehead/imperial court/heaven
paradise (mainly Buddhist)/Elysium/(Budd.) Sukhavati
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
Xuanzang (602-664) Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator, who traveled to India 629-645
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
the East/China
Xuanzang (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
the Jade Emperor
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
Jambudvipa
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
